title: Charlie Dead and the Spoils of Zombie Combat
description: In the post-plague world, Zombie Combat has become mankind’s deadliest game. And playtime is over.  Now Charlie’s friends find themselves thrown into the ring.  What’s it like to be treated like a monster? Charlie, Wendell, Bess, Emma and Sam are about to find out.  They’re up against formidable adversaries. The zealots of the Orthodox Life Church. The risky-business sharks of Nolegys Corporation. The jackbooted thugs of CHEW.  What’s on the line? Oh, nothing much. Just the power to control life, death and free will. Winner take all.  "CHARLIE DEAD and the Spoils of Zombie Combat" is the third novel in the CHARLIE DEAD series.
author: Geoff Camphire
